page.title: 16Christmas Week at School
page.content: On the{Monday}of the last week of term the whole school saw a film called "The Wilderness Family". On the{Tuesday}we had Christmas dinner.We had turkey,stuffing,brussel sprouts and roast potatoes.For dessert we had the choice between peach flan or Christmas Pudding and cream. On the{Wednesday}we had our Fancy Dress Competition and this gave the whole school lots of enjoyment. On{Thursday}afternoon we had our Disco and class parties which were great fun. Our party was by candlelight which was also very enjoyable. On the{Friday}all the cards from our friends were delivered and we all went home after our week of magic.
